pages.text: The natural breed of wild O-Horses is the Mustang, regardless of biome, unless configured otherwise. $(br)Some breeds come with different chances for feathering around their hooves. These are just general chances; every breed has a very small chance of getting any feathering type. $(br2)-Stock: Generally None $(br)-Warmblood: Half or None $(br)-Draft/ Coldblood: Full or Half $(br)-Pony: Full or Half $(br)-Racer: Generally None

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:10, Overlay:17, Breed:0, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:1}
pages.name: Mustang (0)
pages.text: Mustangs (Stock) can come in any color or pattern naturally.

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:6, Overlay:7, Breed:1, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:2}
pages.name: Ardennes (1)
pages.text: Ardennes (Draft) usually come in Bays, Browns and Greys. They can come in smaller markings and often with socks.

pages.name: Kladruber (2)
pages.text: Kladrubers (Warmblood) usually come in Blacks, Blues and Greys. They usually come in solid colors, but can have smaller markings.

pages.name: Fjord (3)
pages.text: Fjords (Pony) usually come in the classic Fjord coloring. They usually come solid.

pages.name: Thoroughbred (4)
pages.text: Thoroughbreds (Racer) usually come in Bays, Browns and Blacks. They can come in a wide array of markings, but are often solid or lightly-marked.

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:2, Overlay:0, Breed:5, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:1}
pages.name: Friesian (5)
pages.text: Friesians (Coldblood) typically only come in Black. They almost never come with markings.

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:213, Overlay:37, Breed:6, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:2}
pages.name: Irish Cob (6)
pages.text: Irish Cobs (Draft) can come in pretty much any color, and often have large, white markings.

pages.name: American Quarter (7)
pages.text: American Quarters (Stock) can come in pretty much any color or marking.

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:15, Overlay:30, Breed:8, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:2}
pages.name: Percheron (8)
pages.text: Percheron (Draft) usually come in Greys. They can come with dapples, small markings, or solid.

pages.name: Selle Francais (9)
pages.text: Selle Francais (Warmblood) usually come in Bay. They usually come solid or with small markings or socks.

pages.name: Marwari (10)
pages.text: Marwari (Warmblood) can come in pretty much any color, and are often solid.

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:28, Overlay:14, Breed:11, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:1}
pages.name: Mongolian (11)
pages.text: Mongolians (Pony) can come in pretty much any color, but most often come in Duns, and can come with small markings or socks.

pages.entity: dragnlivestock:o_horse{Variant:22, Overlay:6, Breed:12, Mane:3, Tail:2, Feathering:2}
pages.name: Shire (12)
pages.text: Shires (Draft) usually come in Browns, Blacks and Bays. They may have small markings or socks.

pages.name: Akhal Teke (13)
pages.text: Akhal Tekes (Racer) usually come in Creams and other light colors. They're generally solid.
